item.description:
John's bday Feb 21st and thats a monday and nobody parties on monday's unless ur an alcoholic. My apologies to those who have now thought that they maaay be alcoholics now for partying on mondays, or maybe your just a person who likes to get crazy?? I don't know. either wayit's going to be for feb 18th, INSTEAD OF THE 17TH* to celebrate this joyous occasion. sound good? i think soooo!!!SEE YOU THERE! :0) PEACE OUT BITCHES! xoxo

ohhh... and P friggin S- wear your party pants and skirts!!! feel free to bring a gift! or $$ to buy the birthday boy a drink b/c sharing is caring and it can be fun!!!! LATA
item.how_to_find_us: Call John at 860-919-9782 or text him.
item.name: Lets have a PARTTTYYYYYY!!! woo woo!!!
